titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for E. D. Bruce papers 1962 and 1964.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Len Coombs

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Len Coombs 2002-08
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English.

change.item: Converted to EAD2002 using Word macro and Xmetal
Original encoding in EAD ver. 1.0 from Word 6.0 file using word macros and manual tagging in A/E.

titlepage.publisher:
Michigan Historical Collections
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
E. D. Bruce papers, 1962 and 1964.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.abstract: Member of Medical Corps, 310th Engineers, U.S. Army who served in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes letter and songs relating to the Polar Bear expedition to Archangel.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by the Polar Bear Association in 1964 (Donor no.: 4145).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, E. D. Bruce papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Served as sergeant Medical Detachment, 310th Engineers.

scopecontent.p: The papers include a short reminiscence and several songs Bruce composed about the campaign.
